title: Add animated About Us section to home page

requirements.summary: Add an animated 'About Us' card section on the home page positioned below the header section and above the 'Our Services' section
acceptanceCriteria: About Us section appears on the home page between the hero/header and the services section
Section uses an animated card component with scroll-reveal animations consistent with existing page patterns
Card styling matches the premium glassmorphism design system already in use (glass effects, gradients, shadows)
Animation triggers on scroll using IntersectionObserver pattern like other sections
Section is compact and concise as specified by 'small' in the request
Content introduces Oishi Heal Touch clinic with brief overview appropriate for homepage placement

file_operations.description: Insert a new About Us section between the hero section and the services section. Add a compact card component with glassmorphism styling (glass-card class) containing a brief introduction to Oishi Heal Touch clinic. Implement scroll-reveal animation using IntersectionObserver pattern consistent with existing sections. Use premium design elements including gradient accents, soft shadows, and the established OKLCH color system. Ensure the section is visually distinct but harmonious with surrounding sections, maintaining the page's premium aesthetic flow.
